spielParagraphs: Let blessed events shine in the memories of your guests with a cake that marks this momentous day. We make heavenly cakes for Christenings, Confirmations, First Communions, Bar Mitzvahs, Passover and even Divorce!
Try our traditional tiered cakes that are lovingly hand-decorated. Or you may want to order a sheet cake with your choice of special words for this wondrous occasion that will be forever remembered.
